children.name: DEFAULT
children.description: Default errors for the ExtendableError type

children.name: ERROR
children.description: This is the default error for the Misstep library. This error does not provide any useful information to the user and should only be used for testing purposes.

children.name: DEFAULT
children.description: Default errors for the MisstepError type

children.name: ERROR
children.description: Misstep has encountered an unknown error. See payload for more information

children.name: VALIDATION
children.description: Validation errors for the MisstepError type

children.name: ERROR
children.description: Misstep has encountered a validation error. See payload for more information

children.name: ERROR
children.description: This error is a fatal error that has not been categorized. See payload for more information
